casebody.data:
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF CHILD PROTECTION AND PERMANENCY, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
B.H., Defendant-Petitioner. In the Matter of T.H. and B.H., Minors-Respondents. C-815 September Term 2017
080379 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 4, 2018

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003759-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
